overview: Yello is a Swiss electronic music band, which formed in Zürich in 1979.[1] For most of the band's history, Yello has been a duo consisting of Dieter Meier and Boris Blank; founding member Carlos Perón left in 1983. Their sound is often characterised by unusual music samples and a heavy reliance on rhythm, with Meier as vocalist and lyricist, and Blank providing the music. Point is their fourteenth studio album
title: Yello: Point
